definition: Luoning county in Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳, Henan
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
Luoning county in Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳, Henan

sentences.english: Halonen said that China has made great progress since her last visit.
sentences.chinese: 哈洛寧表示再訪中國發現中國取得了巨大進步。

sentences.english: "Starter car" carrying 200 passengers, including Putin and Halonen.
sentences.chinese: “首發車”載有200名乘客，包括普京和哈洛寧。
